```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

Load data:
```{r}
exoplanets <- read_csv("data/cleaned_5250.csv")
glimpse(exoplanets)
```

```{r}
library(shiny)

ui <- fluidPage(
  radioButtons("x", "X-Axis Variable", choices = c("distance", "stellar_magnitude", "planet_type", "discovery_year", "mass_multiplier", "radius_multiplier", "orbital_radius", "orbital_period", "eccentricity")),
  radioButtons("y", "Y-Axis Variable", choices = c("distance", "stellar_magnitude", "planet_type", "discovery_year", "mass_multiplier", "radius_multiplier", "orbital_radius", "orbital_period", "eccentricity")),
  plotOutput("plot", width="500px", height="500px")
)

server <- function(input, output, session) {
  output$plot <- renderPlot({
    ggplot(data = exoplanets, 
           aes_string(x=input$x, y=input$y)) +
      geom_point() + 
      theme_light(base_size=18)
  })
}

shinyApp(ui, server)
```
